numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The percentage of young adults that visit their parents at least once a week is much higher than I expected.
3. I did not expect another fact.
4. Around a quarter of all young adults visit their parents in person once a week.
5. If around a quarter of all young adults visit their parents in person once a week then around a quarter of all young adults live close enough to visit frequently.
7. The difference between men and women seems about the same for texts and video-chats.
8. The difference between men and women is not very wide for visits in person.
9. This comment is related to me.
10. I fit the age demographic of young adults.
11. I do not live with my parents.
13. The people around me fit these categories.
14. The title is "How often do Young Adults Contact their Parents?".
